short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily hide unwanted listings on AutoScout24 to streamline your car search experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of seeing the same irrelevant listings over and over again?
With this extension, you can easily manage your AutoScout24 search results by hiding listings that don't match your needs or preferences.

This is how it works:
- Each listing now has a special button that you can click to hide that it.
- You can easily unhide everything again. Just open the extension and click the Unhide All button.

Say goodbye to repetitive and irrelevant listings and enjoy a more efficient and personalized car search experience on AutoScout24. Install now and take control of your search results!

Your feedback is very valuable to me. Email me with any suggestions/improvements you have in mind!

Last but not least, check out more of my Chrome extensions:
- More control over AutoScout24 & Mobile (https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/vista/occmdojmhnokebdhomjinoeiiemkdnpi)
